question: This mobile netrwork has signed a MoU with SAP to jointly offer GST solutions to Indian enterprises.
explanation: BSNL has signed a MoU with SAP to jointly offer innovative GST solutions to enterprises across India. The MoU aims to ensure that every business in the nation successfully adopts GST through BSNL's country-wide reach & SAP's expertise in providing robust technology offerings. The collaboration leverages the capabilities of BSNL as GST Suvidha Provider & SAP as Application Service Provider.
